title: lunarlily v2.0 is live!
content:
Long time, no update! After several months of scattered late-night coding sessions, the site overhaul is (mostly) complete.

  • Now built with Eleventy!
  • New site structure 100% coded by me (wow!)
  • Two new pages (links and changelog)
  • A shiny new coat of CSS paint :]

I'd like to talk about the process and some of the problems I ran into, but I want to get the actual update out first. Keep an eye out for a write-up soon!

title: New TOTW and new neighbors!
content: Finally breaking the Thursday update stretch. New TOTW, the exciting (and very belated!) first addition to the Neighbors section, and a little notice about ongoing site construction (which is why I've been rather quiet!)
unescaped: Finally breaking the Thursday update stretch. New TOTW, the exciting (and very belated!) first addition to the Neighbors section, and a little notice about ongoing site construction (which is why I've been rather quiet!)

title: Journal update! Talking about some books
content: New entry in the journal and a new TOTW. Whenever I update the site, it somehow always ends up on a Thursday...

title: New TOTW
content: New TOTW! Working on several bigger things behind the scenes, life got busy for a bit so I have nothing to show yet but they're coming

title: New Thing of the Week
content: New TOTW, reorganized the archive to be in reverse chronological order (newest to oldest), a few housekeeping things too.

title: An RSS feed is born!
content: If I set everything up correctly, there should now be a link on the right sidebar to this RSS feed! Hello! I also updated a few things on the credits page, including links to helpful RSS guides and some new VSCode extensions I started using recently.
